mapper.insert:
insert into rabbit_info (rabbitNo, cageNo, birthParity, initialWeight, coatGloss, rabbitHouseNo, identicalRabbits, economiType, sex, initialAge, fineHairType, origin, mainCoatColor, paternalNo, coatFeature, maternalNo, roughType, age, coatColor, bornDate, nipplesNumber, photo) values
(#{item.rabbitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cageNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthParity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.initialWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.coatGloss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rabbitHouseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identicalRabbits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.economiType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.initialAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fineHairType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mainCoatColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paternalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.coatFeature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maternalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.roughType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.coatColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bornDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.nipplesNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.photo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select rabbitNo, cageNo, birthParity, initialWeight, coatGloss, rabbitHouseNo, identicalRabbits, economiType, sex, initialAge, fineHairType, origin, mainCoatColor, paternalNo, coatFeature, maternalNo, roughType, age, coatColor, bornDate, nipplesNumber, photo from rabbit_info
mapper.delete:
delete from rabbit_info where rabbitNo in
#{item}
